h2. Create Machine Bucket
{{html:
<hr>
<div class="form-horizontal">
    <div class="control-group">
        <label class="control-label" >Name:</label>
        <div class="controls">
            <input ng-model="bucket.name" type="text" class="input-large" placeholder="Name"/>
        </div>
    </div>
	<hr>
    <div class="control-group">
        <label class="control-label" >Plan:</label>
        <div class="controls " >
            {{include:plan_list}}
        </div>
    </div>
    <hr>
    <div class="control-group">
        <label class="control-label" >Storage:</label>
        <div class="controls " >
            {{include:storage_list}}
        </div>
    </div>
    <hr>
    <div class="control-group">
        <label class="control-label" >Region</label>
        <div class="controls ">{{include:region_list}}</div>
    </div>
	<hr>
    <div class="control-group">
        <label class="control-label" >Image</label>
        <div class="controls ">{{include:image_list}}</div>
    </div>

    <div class="form-actions">
        <button class="btn btn-info btn-large " ng-click="saveBucket()" ng-disabled="!bucketValid()">Create</button>
    </div>
</div>
}}
